title: Weak Attack
description: Enemy attacks closest target for base damage - 1

title: Basic Attack
description: Enemy attacks closest target for base damage

title: Double Weak Attack
description: Enemy attacks closest target 2x for base damage - 1

title: Strong Attack
description: Enemy attacks closest target for base damage + 1

title: Defend
description: Enemy blocks up to 2 damage from the next attack

title: Move
description: Enemy will move or run away

title: Boss
description: Triggers Boss's action. GM draws any played Boss cards back to their hand at the end of the round

title: Hazard
description: Activate a threat that is not related to enemies

title: Hinder
description: Enemy will impose a debuff (e.g. restrain, slow, weaken, frighten, sicken, debuff)

title: Help
description: Enemy will help themselves or their allies (e.g. heal, boost, strenghten, protect, dispel, encourage)
